job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongWe are looking for a Jr Software Engineer who is ready to be challenged with working on the design and development of new projects and the continued development of core products and applications This is an opportunity to join our talented fastpaced development team contributing to creating complex solutions We are looking for a selfstarter who is resourceful and can think outside of the box The ideal candidate will have the ability to learn new concepts and technologies quickly You will interact and work with team members across several business unitsbrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongul liBachelors degree preferably Computer Science Engineering or related field or Bachelors degree and relevant experienceliliExperience with at least one programming language such as Java C PythonliliKnowledge of OOPliliKnowledge of web accessibilityliliFamiliarity with database design amazon web servicesliliStrong verbal and written communications skillsliliCreative flexible and able to work under tight schedules to meet deadlinesliliStrong organizational skillsliliStrong time management skillsliliTeam playerliliInterest in the stock market or financial background is a plusliliApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basisbrliulDow Jones  Making Careers NewsworthybrbrAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin protected veteran status or disability status EEOAAMFDisabledVets brbrDow Jones is committed to providing reasonable accommodation for qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application andor interview process If you need assistance or accommodation in completing your application due to a disability please reach out to us at TalentResourceTeamdowjonescom Please put Reasonable Accommodation in the subject linebrbrBusiness Area Investors Business DailybrbrJob Category IT Development GroupbrbrstronguAbout UsbrbrustrongSince 1882 Dow Jones has been finding new ways to bring information to the worlds top business entities Beginning as a niche news agency in an obscure Wall Street basement Dow Jones has grown to be a worldwide news and information powerhouse with prestigious brands including The Wall Street Journal Dow Jones Newswires Factiva Barrons MarketWatch and Financial NewsbrbrThis longevity and success is due to a relentless pursuit of accuracy depth and innovation enhanced by the wisdom of past experience and a solid grasp on the future ahead More than its individual brands Dow Jones is a modern gateway to intelligence with innovative technology advanced data feeds integrated solutions expert research awardwinning journalism and customizable apps and delivery systems to bring the information that matters most to customers when and where they need it every daybrbrIf you are a current employee at Dow Jones do not apply here Please go to the Career section on your Workday homepage and view Find Jobs  Dow Jones Thank youbrbrReq ID 26167
